---
name: URA3
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae URA3 selectable marker
prefix: AAGC
suffix: ATAG
sequence: 
---

Gene encoding orotidine-5'-phosphate decarboxylase in the uracil biosynthesis pathway of S. cerevisiae. Enables growth on uracil-free media for auxotrophic strains and can be counter-selected with 5-fluoroorotic acid (5-FOA).
